item.description:
Extremely challenging times will soon be upon us, due to several situations which have reached a critical threshold. 

To better understand why our very survival depends upon personal preparedness steps we  take now, please view the following links:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eidQTDjQ5gw   (Crash Course - The Three E's)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nI-BIVWlc7A    (Resources & Monetary Systems)

http://www.krystalspiral.com/CamelotInterviews.htm (2012 Cosmic Energy Changes)

http://www.stansberryresearch.com/pro/1103PSIEOAVD/EPSIM610/PR?o=371006&s=374061&u=52231259&l=267744&r=Milo

This time we will be discussing Solar Greenhouses UNDERGROUND! This info is based upon a book by Daniel Geery, which describes how t build a year-round earth-sheltered garden.

Please feel free to make suggestions for future topics. 

Meetup Format:  All members share in conversation, expressing their ideas while enjoying a meal from 6:00 to 7:30 PM.  We should adjourn around 7:45 since they close at 8:00 PM.

This format is totally different from that of a class.  It is also different from that of speaker giving a talk to an audience. 

Although a topic has been selected as the main focus for the Meetup, related topics may also be discussed by members.  Members are encouraged to develop friendships and participate in personal sharing.

Also, we should keep in mind that when Meetups are conducted at a cafe or restaurant, it is both customary and expected that those sitting at the tables will simultaneously be eating something purchased there. 

The organic  food and wholesome hot meals available at the Celery Stick Cafe are a BIG reason that this Venue was selected as the main meeting place for this group. 

Although purchasing a hot meal there is not a requirement, it would be a fair expectation that you would at least have a snack, or some of their yummy dessert.

Also, please keep in mind that it is expected that members take the time to view info on the website links provided when a Meetup topic is announced.  

Please understand that you are not attending a class, and no handouts should be expected. 

Feel free to bring books for others to look through, but it would be a copyrite violation to distribute copies of pages taken from reference materials.

To Contact Group Organizer: Send an e-mail  info@ulcsclinic.com with "Meetup Member" in subject line so your message doesn't end up deleted unread.

Please remember that although your group organizer visits this site once a month to post new topics, She does not check the e-mail address associated with any Meetup sites. That means that if you use the site's mechanism to contact the organizer, your message will not get read.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on one of the tables.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Solar Greenhouses: UNDERGROUND!
